channel.title: Atomic Red Team on Lets Automate It
channel.description: Recent content in Atomic Red Team on Lets Automate It

item.title: Automating Attck Testing With Soar and Atomic Red Team
item.description: MITRE ATT&CK is the defacto framework for organizations to measure their defense posture. ATT&CK provides categorical verticals in the form of tactics, which align to the common methodologies attackers use. Within these verticals are a set (and subsets) of common ways in which attackers accomplish a tactic (vertical). These are known as techniques. Some techniques may be common across multiple operating systems. This usually equates to a broad definition of a technique.
